concept.definition: The element defines the population that forms the basis for research.
The element defines an exposure within the population that is being researched.
The element defines an outcome within the population that is being researched.

description: The possible types of research elements (E.g. Population, Exposure, Outcome).
name: ResearchElementType

text.div:
ResearchElementType

The possible types of research elements (E.g. Population, Exposure, Outcome).

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/research-element-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
population PopulationThe element defines the population that forms the basis for research.
exposure ExposureThe element defines an exposure within the population that is being researched.
outcome OutcomeThe element defines an outcome within the population that is being researched.

title: ResearchElementType
